mapper.select: SELECT gp.*, (select COUNT(*) from ntm_schemas.itm_code cd where cd.code_group = gp.code_group ) as code_cnt FROM ntm_schemas.itm_code_group gp
SELECT cd.* , to_char(cd.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date_str FROM ntm_schemas.itm_code cd WHERE code_group = #{code_group}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ntm_schemas.itm_code_group ( code_group, code_group_name, description, use_yn, reg_user, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{code_group}, #{code_group_name}, #{description}, #{use_yn}, #{cookieUserId}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE ntm_schemas.itm_code_group SET code_group_name = #{code_group_name}, description = #{description}, use_yn = #{use_yn}, reg_user = #{cookieUserId}, reg_date = now() WHERE code_group = #{code_group}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ntm_schemas.itm_code ( code_group, code_id, code_name, description, use_yn, priority, reg_user, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{code_group}, #{code_id}, #{code_name}, #{description}, #{use_yn}, #{priority}::bigint, #{cookieUserId}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE ntm_schemas.itm_code SET code_name = #{code_name}, priority = #{priority}::bigint, description = #{description}, use_yn = #{use_yn}, reg_user = #{cookieUserId}, reg_date = now() WHERE code_group = #{code_group} AND code_id = #{code_id}
